SELECT interface_id, interface_type_cd, url, version, interface_nm, interface_desc, bypass_yn, status_cd FROM tb_cm_interface
url = #{url} interface_id = #{interfaceId}
SELECT C.chnl_nm FROM tb_cm_route A INNER JOIN tb_cm_bypass B ON A.bypass_id = B.bypass_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_cm_chnl C ON B.chnl_id = C.chnl_id WHERE A.interface_id = #{interfaceId}
SELECT C.chnl_nm FROM tb_cm_route A INNER JOIN tb_cm_svc B ON A.svc_id = B.svc_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_cm_chnl C ON B.chnl_id = C.chnl_id WHERE A.interface_id = #{interfaceId}

SELECT 'bypass' as bypass, C.protocol_cd, (SELECT cd_nm FROM tb_cm_cd WHERE cd_id = C.protocol_cd) AS protocol_nm, C.domain, C.port, B.path FROM tb_cm_route A INNER JOIN tb_cm_bypass B ON A.bypass_id = B.bypass_id INNER JOIN tb_cm_component C ON B.component_id = C.component_id WHERE A.interface_id = #{interfaceId}
SELECT 'service' as service, B.pkg_nm, B.class_nm, B.method_nm FROM tb_cm_route A INNER JOIN tb_cm_svc B ON A.svc_id = B.svc_id WHERE A.interface_id = #{interfaceId}
